description_ar: الوضوء أو الغسل حسب الحاجة قبل الصلاة
description_en: Ablution or ritual bath as needed before prayer

dalil.text_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا قُمْتُمْ إِلَى الصَّلَاةِ فَاغْسِلُوا وُجُوهَكُمْ
dalil.text_en: O you who believe! When you rise up for prayer, wash your faces

description_en: The entrance of the legally prescribed prayer time

dalil.text_ar: إِنَّ الصَّلَاةَ كَانَتْ عَلَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ كِتَابًا مَّوْقُوتًا
dalil.text_en: Indeed, prayer has been decreed upon the believers a decree of specified times

description_ar: التوجه نحو الكعبة المشرفة في مكة المكرمة
description_en: Facing towards the Holy Kaaba in Mecca

dalil.text_ar: فَوَلِّ وَجْهَكَ شَطْرَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَحَيْثُ مَا كُنتُمْ فَوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ شَطْرَهُ
dalil.text_en: So turn your face toward al-Masjid al-Haram. And wherever you are, turn your faces toward it

description_en: Covering the private parts with clean, covering clothing

dalil.text_ar: يَا بَنِي آدَمَ خُذُوا زِينَتَكُمْ عِندَ كُلِّ مَسْجِدٍ
dalil.text_en: O children of Adam, take your adornment at every masjid

description_ar: أن يكون مكان الصلاة طاهراً من النجاسات
description_en: The place of prayer must be pure from impurities

dalil.text_en: The earth has been made for me a place of prostration and a means of purification

description_ar: أن تكون الثياب طاهرة من النجاسات
description_en: The clothing must be pure from impurities
The one praying must be sane and discerning

dalil.text_ar: رفع القلم عن ثلاثة: عن النائم حتى يستيقظ، وعن المجنون حتى يعقل، وعن الصبي حتى يحتلم
dalil.text_en: The pen has been lifted from three: from the sleeper until he awakens, from the insane until he becomes sane, and from the child until he reaches puberty

description_en: Intention in the heart to perform the specific prayer

dalil.text_ar: إنما الأعمال بالنيات وإنما لكل امرئ ما نوى
dalil.text_en: Actions are but by intention and every person will have only what they intended
